cause.description:
there is so much animal cruelty, i would ask if you would put your name down to help stop animal creulty. if you don't you are to selfish and don't give a care.
1. Canada's seal hunt must end.
2. people buy pets if you are going to take care of them.
3. treat animals like humans they are just as important.
cause.mission: throw the owners in jail for animal creulty.
cause.name: animal cruelty
